title: 登录国建服务器总是掉线
author: keypout
txt_content:
联通10M，登录国家建筑师服务器的时候总是莫名奇妙的掉线。有时能撸很久，有时刚上线连密码都还没打就掉线了。报错也是各式各样，短时间会因为不同原因掉线，选了几个po出来。

Internal Exception: io.netty.handler.codec.DecorderException: java.util.zip.DataFormatException: invalid distance too far back

Internal Exception: io.netty.handler.codec.DecorderException: java.util.zip.DataFormatException: incorrect data check

Internal Exception: io.netty.handler.codec.DecorderException: java.io.IOException: Packet 0/60 (S3CPacketUpdateScore) was larger than I expected, found 1 bytes extra whilst reading packet 60

Internal Exception: io.netty.handler.codec.DecorderException: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 103

Internal Exception: io.netty.handler.codec.DecorderException: Badly compressed packet - size of 35 is below server threshold of 256

求救，这样老是掉线再上线很影响撸建筑的心情啊
